channel.title: Hello
channel.description:
Hello there everybody
im new to these forums, and decided to join.. im an amature scar scripter and have made a few scripts etc, ill post them up later for ya\'ll to use :) so i hope i fit in well in this community.
ps: its my birthday today ;P

item.title: Hello
item.dc:creator: @milkyway100 frostbyte100
item.description:
@milkyway100 wrote:

well no - where for a while, havent been scripting some time now im from back in the days when stoopids guild miner ran flawlessly ill register for SRL forums and that a bit later to learn more about the current scar includes

Read full topic

item.title: Hello
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

Happy Birthday!

Always good to see new users who take the time to introduce thereselfs into the community. Hope you like it here! Where have you been hanging out before these forums?
